00021 vector<Post*> Plurk::BasicSearch(BasicQuery* q)
00022 {
00023         vector<Post*> p;
00024         cout<<"Plurk basic search"<<endl;
00025 
00026         char sys_call[1024] = {0};
00027         sprintf(sys_call, "python ./Plurk/Plurk_Query.py query -r %s", q->GetKeyword().c_str());
00028         
00029     system( sys_call ); 
00030 
00031         Json::Value root;
00032         ifstream fin("POST.json");
00033         fin >> root;
00034         fin.close();
00035 
00036         int index = root.size();
00037         Post* pre = NULL;
00038 
00039         for(int i=0; i< index; ++i){
00040                 Message *_p = new Message();
00041                 _p->SetMessage(root[i]);
00042         
00043                 Post* p_cur = new PlurkPuDecorator( new PlurkReplyDecorator( _p ));
00044                 if(pre != NULL){
00045                         p_cur->SetPrevPost( pre );
00046                         pre->SetNextPost(p_cur);
00047                 }               
00048                 p.push_back( p_cur  );
00049                 pre = p_cur;
00050         }
00051 
00052         return p;
00053 }

00055 vector<Post*> Plurk::AdvancedSearch(AdvancedQuery* q)
00056 {
00057         vector<Post*> p;
00058         cout<<"Plurk advanced search"<<endl;
00059         
00060 
00061         char sys_call[1024] = {0};
00062         char add_opt[1024] = {0};
00063         string keyword = q->GetKeyword();
00064         string person = q->GetPerson();
00065 
00066         if(keyword.compare("*") != 0)
00067                 sprintf(add_opt, "-r %s", keyword.c_str());
00068         if(person.compare("*") != 0)
00069                 sprintf(add_opt, "%s -u %s", add_opt, person.c_str());
00070 
00071         sprintf(sys_call, "python ./Plurk/Plurk_Query.py query %s", add_opt);
00072         system( sys_call );     
00073 
00074         Json::Value root;
00075         ifstream fin("POST.json");
00076         fin >> root;
00077         fin.close();
00078 
00079         int index = root.size();
00080         Post* pre = NULL;
00081 
00082         for(int i=0; i< index; ++i){
00083                 Message *_p = new Message();
00084                 _p->SetMessage(root[i]);
00085         
00086                 Post* p_cur = new PlurkPuDecorator( new PlurkReplyDecorator( _p ));
00087                 if(pre != NULL){

00089                         pre->SetNextPost(p_cur);
00090                 }
